Gift.title: Gift
Gift.description: Represents a gift item that guests can view and contribute to, managed through the admin panel.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Gift entity.

name.description: The name of the gift item.

description.description: A detailed description of the gift item.

price.description: The price of the gift item in Brazilian Reais (R$). Decimal type.

imageUrl.description: URL of the image associated with the gift item, stored in object storage.

externalLink.description: External URL where the gift can be purchased or contributed to.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the gift item was created.

Rsvp.title: Rsvp
Rsvp.description: Captures guest attendance confirmations and related details for the wedding event.

id.description: Unique identifier for the RSVP confirmation.

fullName.description: The full name of the guest confirming presence.

isAttending.description: Indicates whether the guest will be attending the event.

numberOfGuests.description: The number of additional guests accompanying the primary guest.

guestNames.description: List of names and types (adult/child) of the accompaniments.

phoneNumber.description: Contact phone number of the guest.

message.description: An optional message from the guest.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the RSVP confirmation was submitted.

Invitee.title: Invitee
Invitee.description: Represents a guest who is officially invited to the wedding, used for the master guest list.

fullName.description: The full name of the invited guest.

category.description: Category of the guest (e.g., Family, Friends, Work).

guestLimit.description: Total number of people allowed for this invitation (including the main guest).

createdAt.description: Timestamp when added to the list.

EventSetting.title: EventSetting
EventSetting.description: Stores global configuration and details for the wedding event.
